overview_of_class: This class will introduce students to the basics of information design and data visualization?the craft of organizing and representing information, numbers, and data sets in static and interactive graphics. After bolstering their visual literacy with case studies of successful and muddled information design, students will use basic statistical analysis to find stories in data, then storyboard and build both static and interactive graphics to publish online using JavaScript.

overview_of_class: This five-week class is an introduction to effective and moving personal narrative storytelling. We will explore the history and evolution of personal narrative, and read, listen and analyze first-person pieces in an effort to help us find our own voices. We will learn to pitch and produce stories, essays and multimedia pieces that incorporate reporting, experience, emotion, perspective and other important elements. Students will write/produce at least one piece targeted for a specific publication, website or broadcast audience.
